get.description:
Download the STIX bundle with the given hash.

The following permissions are required:
 - **INTHREAT_READ_OBJECTS** (`8d9901dc-0508-4472-b3c1-5ad5efc96032`): View Intelligence objects and observables.
Each response gives a `next_cursor` attribute that can be used in the `cursor` parameter for the next request

parameters.name: match[type]
parameters.description: Match observables by their type.

get.summary: Consume a feed of object relationships
get.description:
Yields a feed of relationships involving the objects matching the provided IDs.
Each response gives a `next_cursor` attribute that can be used in the `cursor` parameter for the next request

parameters.name: match[id]
parameters.description: Ids of the objects to get the relationships from.

get.description: Each response gives a `next_cursor` attribute that can be used in the `cursor` parameter for the next request

parameters.name: match[type]
parameters.description: Match objects by their type.

parameters.name: match[observable_type]
parameters.description: Match indicators by the observables the pattern contains.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of objects to return, maximum is 10000 for the text format and 2000 for others

parameters.name: skip_expired
parameters.description: Whether we should skip expired indicators

parameters.name: include_revoked
parameters.description: Whether revoked objects should be included

parameters.name: return_all_fields
parameters.description: Whether all the fields of an object should be returned

parameters.name: format
parameters.description: Format of the response

post.description:
It will generate a file with all the related objects in the specified format.
It is possible to optionally restrict the related objects
to only the ones linked by some specific types of relationships

The following permissions are required:
 - **INTHREAT_READ_OBJECTS** (`8d9901dc-0508-4472-b3c1-5ad5efc96032`): View Intelligence objects and observables.

get.description:
It allows to get the details of a job and its status.

The following permissions are required:
 - **INTHREAT_READ_OBJECTS** (`8d9901dc-0508-4472-b3c1-5ad5efc96032`): View Intelligence objects and observables.

The job must be with the status "FINISHED" in order to be able to retrieve the file

The following permissions are required:
 - **INTHREAT_READ_OBJECTS** (`8d9901dc-0508-4472-b3c1-5ad5efc96032`): View Intelligence objects and observables.

post.description:
The following permissions are required:

get.description:
The following permissions are required:
 - **INTHREAT_READ_FEEDS** (`b30103ab-408d-4ccf-86c9-3d9a820c97d9`): View feeds listing.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: limit a number of items (allowed range is 1-100), default is 20.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: a number of items to skip, default is 0.

parameters.name: term
parameters.description: Term the feed title should contain

parameters.name: match[id]
parameters.description: Filter feeds by their id

get.description:
Retrieve the number of objects of the given type in the given period
The previous period is also computed for comparison

The following permissions are required:
 - **INTHREAT_READ_OBJECTS** (`8d9901dc-0508-4472-b3c1-5ad5efc96032`): View Intelligence objects and observables.

Retrieve top most used objects for the given type in the given period

The following permissions are required:
 - **INTHREAT_READ_OBJECTS** (`8d9901dc-0508-4472-b3c1-5ad5efc96032`): View Intelligence objects and observables.
 - **GLOBAL_READ_TELEMETRY** (`c846153e-0ac4-4c74-a635-3ac63e993c6b`): View telemetry emitted globally by the platform.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: limit a number of items (allowed range is 1-200), default is 10.

get.description:
Retrieve top most used objects for the given type in the given period

The following permissions are required:
 - **INTHREAT_READ_OBJECTS** (`8d9901dc-0508-4472-b3c1-5ad5efc96032`): View Intelligence objects and observables.
 - **GLOBAL_READ_TELEMETRY** (`c846153e-0ac4-4c74-a635-3ac63e993c6b`): View telemetry emitted globally by the platform.

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Number of items to return between 1 and 10, default is 5.
